descriptions.default: There is no element that meets the search criteria. Try other search parameters
descriptions.driver_result: We could not find any record that satisfies your request. Check that this session actually took place and that the specified driver participated in it
descriptions.results: We could not find any record that satisfies your request. Check that this session actually took place
descriptions.fastest_lap: We could not find the fastest lap of this session. Probably there aren't information about lap times in this session

no_such_column.title: Attribute not found
no_such_column.detail: The column {{ column }} was not found in the resource. We can not make any action with it

internal_server_error.title: Internal Server Error
internal_server_error.detail: An unexpected error occurred on the server

route_not_found.title: Route or path not found
route_not_found.detail: The specified URL is not valid. Please verify that this route exists.
